text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Planning and Development 

(Prescribed Newspapers) Regulations 2025.

title: and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby make the following
heading: In these Regulations “Principal Act” means Planning and Development
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations “Principal Act” means Planning and Development

National newspaper
text_norm: 2 regulation principal act mean planning development act 2024 (no 34 2024) national newspaper

title: and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby make the following
heading: 3. (1) The publications set out in the Schedule are prescribed as national
text_raw:
3. (1) The publications set out in the Schedule are prescribed as national 

newspapers for the purposes of the Principal Act. 

(2) For the purposes of paragraph (1), a publication may include an online 

version of that publication. 

Approved local newspaper
text_norm: 3 (1) publication set schedule prescribed national newspaper purpose principal act (2) purpose paragraph (1) publication may include online version publication approved local newspaper

title: and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby make the following
heading: 4. (1) In considering an approval of a publication circulating in its functional
text_raw:
4. (1) In considering an approval of a publication circulating in its functional 
area, an online version of a publication or an online publication as an approved 
local newspaper, a planning authority shall— 

(a) 

have regard to the level of – 

(i) 

circulation and distribution, or 

(ii) 

readership and accessibility, 

as the case may be, of the publication, online version of the 
publication or the online publication concerned, in the functional 
area of the planning authority, in order to support, in so far as is 
reasonable, the availability of notices to be published under the 
Principal Act, and 

(b) 

include the publication on a list of approved local newspapers 
maintained by the authority. 

(2) Different publications, online versions of publications or online 
publications may be approved as approved local newspapers for one or more 
specified parts of the functional area of a planning authority, as the planning 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [264] 3 

authority considers appropriate, having regard to the matters to be considered 
under paragraph (1) in respect of the part or parts of that functional area. 

(3) A planning authority shall— 

(a) 

publish the list referred to in paragraph (1) on its website, and 

(b) display a copy of the list in or at the offices of the planning 
authority and make available copies of the list at those offices 
during office hours, free of charge.

title: and Development Act 2024 (No. 34 of 2024), hereby make the following
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations— 

• 

• 

set out a list of publications in the Schedule that are prescribed as 
national newspapers for the purposes of the Planning and 
Development Act 2024, and 

prescribe the manner in which a planning authority approves a local 
newspaper for the purposes of that Act.
